title: Question 15
prompt: For this treatment to work, what must be true about healthy human cells?
description:
Directions: Click the one best answer to each question.

In treating cancer, scientists look for ways to kill cancer cells without killing the surrounding healthy cells. Some scientists are working on using very small particles of gold, called gold nanoparticles, to kill cancer. Gold nanoparticles attach to cancer cells, but not to healthy cells. The diagram below shows how gold nanoparticles might be used to destroy cancer.
feedback: The Near Infrared Light must travel through healthy cells without damaging them in order to kill only the cancer cells.
